sentences.en: Besides , you could hardly accuse Mr Obama of timidity.
sentences.cn: 此外，你也不能指责奥巴马胆怯。

sentences.en: Brian sided with his sister, which led his mother to accuse him of being disloyal.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩站在他姐姐这一边，他母亲就此指责他不忠。

sentences.en: He laughs loudly when I accuse him of fibbing.
sentences.cn: 当我指责他说谎时，他大笑起来。

sentences.en: I don't think it's fair to accuse me of having an attitude problem.
sentences.cn: 我觉得指责我有态度问题有失公允。

sentences.en: I hate it when people accuse us of that.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌别人就那件事指责我们。

sentences.en: I've been wrong to accuse him.
It is recognition of compassion's part that leads the up - holders of capital punishment to accuse the abolitionists of sentimentality in being more sorry for the murderer than for his victim.
sentences.cn: 正是对怜悯的作用有了认识,才使得死刑的提倡者指控主张废除死刑的人感情用事,同情谋杀犯胜过同情受害者.

sentences.en: It's wrong to accuse him when he's not here and can't answer you back.
sentences.cn: 他现在人不在,没法反驳你,你指责他是不对的.

sentences.en: Later, at home, Zilla would accuse him of being a coward and a weakling.
sentences.cn: 等到了家里, 齐拉就数落他是个懦夫, 软骨头.

sentences.en: Make sure of your facts before you accuse him.
sentences.cn: 在指责他以前要把材料核实一下.

sentences.en: She can not accuse me of showing one bit of deceitful softness.
sentences.cn: 她不能控诉我说我表示过一点虚伪的温柔.

sentences.en: Some people accuse the tax inspectors of bully-boy tactics.
sentences.cn: 有些人指控税务稽查员使用了流氓手段。

sentences.en: Talk things through in stages. Do not accuse or apportion blame.
sentences.cn: 把事情按部就班地讲清楚。不要责难或归罪于人。

sentences.en: The professor stands accused of (=  has been accused of  ) stealing his student’s ideas and publishing them.
sentences.cn: 那位教授被指控剽窃学生的观点拿去发表。

sentences.en: They may even accuse the child of disloyalty.
sentences.cn: 他们甚至责备孩子不忠诚.

sentences.en: We don't want to accuse anyone unjustly.

words.tran_cn: 非难的，指责的；控诉的，控告的

trans.tran_en: to say that you believe someone is guilty of a crime or of doing something bad

trans.tran_cn: 指控， 控告； 指责
